programme.title: Witticisms and Crazy One-Liners
programme.short_synopsis: With the Balkan wars still ongoing, Alistair Cooke relies on humour for some light relief.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke tries to forget the worrying events like the Balkan wars in the news by remembering some witticism and anecdotes.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
